mapper.insert: insert into label (LABEL_ID, LABEL_CODE, LABEL_NAME, LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, GRP_LABEL_CODE, PUB_FLG) values (#{labelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{labelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grpLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update label set LABEL_CODE = #{labelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_NAME = #{labelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_DESC = #{labelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_TYPE = #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE = #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_DATA_TYPE = #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRP_LABEL_CODE = #{grpLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUB_FLG = #{pubFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LABEL_ID = #{labelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select LABEL_ID, LABEL_CODE, LABEL_NAME, LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, GRP_LABEL_CODE, PUB_FLG from label where LABEL_ID = #{labelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select LABEL_ID, LABEL_CODE, LABEL_NAME, LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, GRP_LABEL_CODE, PUB_FLG from label

select LABEL_ID, LABEL_CODE, LABEL_NAME, LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, GRP_LABEL_CODE, PUB_FLG from label where LABEL_CODE = #{labelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LABEL_TYPE = 70
